text: thumb K. J. Somaiya Medical College & Research Centre is a medical college in the heart of Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. The college was founded by Karamshi Jethabhai Somaiya. It has 50 undergraduate seats for MBBS matriculants. It is situated in the Somaiya Ayurvihar Complex, a 22.5 acre campus located in central Mumbai. It is currently managed by the Somaiya Trust. The hospital is also a quarantine facility for COVID-19 patients. ==Rankings== The college was ranked 35th among medical colleges in India in 2017 by The Week. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Universities and colleges in Mumbai Category:Affiliates of Maharashtra University of Health Sciences Category:Medical colleges in Maharashtra
title: K. J. Somaiya Medical College & Research Centre
